subject: AI & Agents
title: Data Quality: Garbage In, Garbage Out
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Data Quality: Garbage In, Garbage Out.

hook.text: A model trained on spam, hate speech, and wrong math will produce exactly that.

buildup.text: Training data quality determines model quality more than model size.

discovery.text: Curation steps: deduplication, toxicity filtering, quality scoring, and domain balancing.

twist.text: Even 'clean' data has biasesâ€”who wrote it, when, in which language, from which culture.

climax.text: Document your data sources. Audit for gaps. Update as the world changes.

punchline.text: The model is only as good as what it read.

quiz.question: Why is data quality more important than model size?
options: Bad data produces bad outputs regardless of size
